content: if you could credit me as a designer i recommend to look/read through the whole pattern before you start never hesitate to contact me through my instagram account or etsy shop and think about the environment and don t i will do my best to help you print out if you do so avoid printing the enjoy this pattern pages with full page-pictures with love halime 2 head start with beige color round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase x 6 18 round 4 18 single_crochet 18 round 5 5 single_crochet increase x 3 21 round 6 21 single_crochet 21 round 7 3 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet x 2 increase 3 single_crochet 24 round 8 24 single_crochet 24 round 9 3 single_crochet increase x 6 30 round 10 2 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet 48 place the security eyes between round 9 and 10 with 7-8 stitches between the eyes use 6 mm security eyes if using 2 0 mm hook otherwise use what fits the gauge best change to creme color tip on the next page you will find step by step images how to make bobble stitches round 14 48 single_crochet 48 round 15 1 bobble 2 single_crochet x 16 48 round 16 48 single_crochet 48 round 17 single_crochet x 5 decrease 3 single_crochet 42 round 21 2 single_crochet 1 bobble x 14 42 round 22 5 single_crochet decrease x 6 36 round 23 1 single_crochet 1 bobble decrease 1 bobble 2 single_crochet 1 bobble x 5 decrease 1 bobble 1 single_crochet 30 stuff the head with filling and keep doing as you go round 24 3 single_crochet decrease x 6 24 round 25 1 single_crochet 1 bobble decrease x 6 18 round 26 1 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 round 27 decrease x 6 6 fasten_off and leave a yarn tail weave the yarn tail through the front loops of each stitch and pull it tight to close then weave in the yarn ends how to make bobble stitches bobble 1 start with yarn over the hook 2 insert the hook through the 3 yarn over and draw through 4 you will now have two 5 repeat step 1-3 remember 6 repeat step 1-3 you will now stitch yarn over and draw up a the two first loops on the loops on your hook to draw the yarn only through have four loops on the hook loop hook the two first loops you will now have three loops on the hook 7 repeat step 1-3 you will now 8 yarn over
